title: add support for typographic ligatures
body: so we use something like the awesome https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode font in the console.

comments.body: +1 for Dan Maher's comment. Hasklig support would be superb!
Or you know, Google's material icon font.
Also, support for .otf fonts with ligatures would be great such as https://github.com/i-tu/Hasklig
